The diagram depicts the three lower layers of the O S I model, with the focus on PPP in Layer 2, the Data Link Layer.

The lowest level is the Physical Layer that deals with synchronous or asynchronous media.

PPP is at the Data Link Layer, where there are two sub-protocols: Link Control Protocol and Network Control Protocol. Link Control Protocol is responsible for authentication and other options. The Network Control Protocol is involved in the interaction between the Data Link Layer and various Network Layer protocols: IP, IPX, IPCP, IPXCP, and many others.
